# File lib/gnupg.rb, line 12
  def initialize(system_options = {}, ubiquitous_options = {})
    @binary = system_options[:binary] || "/opt/local/bin/gpg"
    @workdir = system_options[:workdir] || "."
    @homedir_pub = system_options[:homedir_pub] || "."
    @homedir_sec = system_options[:homedir_sec] || "."
    @recipient = system_options[:recipient] || "uid"
  end
